sentences: See nädal, kuu, aasta hakkab (ära) lõppema.
context: The verb 'lõppema' in Estonian has multiple meanings depending on context. It can mean to end or finish something (temporally, spatially, or as a process), to run out/be depleted (of resources), or to die/come to an end (especially of animals). The dictionary shows it's used for finishing periods of time, ending activities, concluding stories, when supplies are exhausted, and even meaning death or becoming withered/wretched.
